definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)
to give a discount/to be of less value than anticipated

sentences.english: There's a discount for these sample copies.
Normally we do not give any discounts, because the prices have already been greatly reduced.
sentences.chinese: 通常我們是不打折扣的，因爲價錢已經減得很低。

sentences.english: The general wisdom in Asia is to not discount franchises, even those located in mega-malls.
sentences.chinese: 在亞洲，一般店都是不打折的，即使在大型商場裏。

sentences.english: In their pupa stage, they resemble broken twigs.
sentences.chinese: 在成蛹階段，它們像被打折了的嫩枝。

sentences.english: I'd like to buy this toy dog. Can you give me a discount?
sentences.chinese: 我想買這隻玩具狗。你能給我打折嗎？

sentences.english: Fang Xingdong says, suiting a group to buy this kind to hit those who change promotion pattern is specific commodity.
sentences.chinese: 方興東說，適合團購這種打折推廣模式的是特定商品。

sentences.english: If you're only going to order fifty, it will have to be without a discount.
sentences.chinese: 如果您只訂五十臺，就沒辦法打折扣。

sentences.english: I'm sorry. But this is one-price shop.
But if it's on sale, I'll probably buy it.
sentences.chinese: 但要是在打折，我估計就會買下來。

sentences.english: It can help get you discount coupons for local eateries and bars for example.
sentences.chinese: 比如它可以幫你你得到當地餐館和酒吧的打折卷。

sentences.english: Is there any way to get discounted tickets?
The department sore is offering big discounts to drum up business.
sentences.chinese: 爲了招攬生意這家百貨商場進行打折活動。

sentences.english: Would you like a discount on your room charge?
sentences.chinese: 你的住宿費需要打折嗎？

sentences.english: Her bag is stuffed with McDonald's coupons and other discount cards.
sentences.chinese: 她的手包裏有麥當勞的優惠券和其他各種打折卡。

sentences.english: No discount for these off-price merchandise.

definition: buy one, get one free/two for the price of one
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
group buying/collective buying/buying by a group of individuals who negotiate a discount for the group
to bargain/to cut or beat down a price
